name: docking-station
description: Docking Station is a self-hosted UI for managing Docker Compose environments. It allows starting, stopping, and monitoring services in real-time, suitable for personal servers and developers.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Manage Docker Compose environments visually. Simplified operations

features.title: Service Monitoring
features.description: Track service status in real-time. Stay informed instantly

features.title: Quick Actions
features.description: Start, stop, and restart services easily. Efficient control

features.title: Developer
features.description: Perfect for personal servers and development. Built for developers

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: See changes as they happen. Live monitoring

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your compose manager privately. Your services, your dashboard
